data.name: THAT Conference
data.description: THAT Conference is the Summer Camp for Geeks that combines technology, networking, social events and exposure in an inspirational, family friendly environment at the The Kalahari Resort in Wisconsin Dells.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day Nordics 2020
relatedRecords.description: The AWS Community Day is a free full day event for AWS users organized by the community. Once a year all AWS users come together to network, learn from each other and get inspired. At this event, there will be no vendor talks, no partner talks, no sponsored talks. relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit - London
relatedRecords.description: Comsum is the Community Summit for AWS. Multi track events with talks and workshops from AWS Community Heroes and Community Members. After the talks networking with 50 classic arcade cabinets, great food and drink.
